title: We Are All People
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 47 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 140L
description: All over the world, people have homes, food, clothing and entertainment but live in very different ways. We Are All People helps readers connect to the world around them by showing them children from around the world engaged in different activities. This book helps build readers' confidence through the use of predictive text, while photographs help students connect to both the text and their prior knowledge. This book can also be used to teach students how to determine the author's purpose in a text and recognize nouns.
reviewWords: clothes, different, homes, live, same, world
comprehension: Author's Purpose                : Determine the author’s purpose
